lead_paragraph: Investigators in Brooklyn thought severed remains that were found this year belonged to a woman and could only guess at her age, but a break came when one of them noticed a degraded tattoo.

headline.print_headline: The Hunt for a Dead Woman’s Identity, Aided by Her Faded Tattoo
headline.main: The Hunt for a Dead Woman’s Identity, Aided by Her Faded Tattoo

snippet: Investigators in Brooklyn thought severed remains that were found this year belonged to a woman and could only guess at her age, but a break came when one of them noticed a degraded tattoo.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column probes case of unsolved homicide in Brooklyn involving a dismembered body with a faded tattoo on one leg; detectives are seeking counsel from local tattoo artists in hopes of identifying what they believe is middle-aged woman whose body parts have been discovered in multiple locales near Coney Island Creek.
